title: Definitions: Annotations.
description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys/objects (direct children) uniquely used to describe Annotations (Section 3.1 and 3.3.5).

contextValueFound.title: Definition: Valid @context string
contextValueFound.description: True when the string has value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 3.1)

contextValueInArrayFound.title: Definition: Valid @context string found in array
contextValueInArrayFound.description: True when the array contains a string item having value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 3.1)

annotationTypeValueRecognized.title: Definition: Valid annotation type value string
annotationTypeValueRecognized.description: True when the string has value 'Annotation' (Section 3.1)

annotationTypeValueInArrayRecognized.title: Definition: Valid annotation type array
annotationTypeValueInArrayRecognized.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'Annotation' (Section 3.1)

annotationTypeValueFound.title: Implementation: Annotation type
annotationTypeValueFound.description: True when the Annotation has type key and 'Annotation' is a value of type (Section 3.1)

motivationList.title: Definitions: list of motivation and purposes
motivationList.description: List of motivations and purposes as defined in the model (Section 3.3.5).

motivationRecognizedIfPresent.title: Validation: motivation value
motivationRecognizedIfPresent.description: True when the annotation has 0 or more motivation property values (Section 3.3.5)

motivationSingularIfPresent.title: Validation: singular motivation value
motivationSingularIfPresent.description: True when the annotation has 0 or exactly one motivation property value (Section 3.3.5)

motivationPropertyFound.title: Collate: via motivation with qualifying annotation class
motivationPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of via (if/when) used on Annotation (Sections 3.3.5)

singleMotivationPropertyFound.title: Collate: via motivation with qualifying annotation class
singleMotivationPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of via (if/when) used on Annotation (Sections 3.3.5)

stylesheetValueDefinition.title: Definition: stylesheet value
stylesheetValueDefinition.description: True when Annotation has no stylesheet, references an external stylesheet, or has embedded stylesheet of type CssStylesheet (Section 4.4)

stylesheetDetected.title: Check for implementation of Annotation stylesheet
stylesheetDetected.description: True when the Annotation has a valid stylesheet property (Section 4.4)

bodyValueValidIfPresent.title: Validation: bodyValue
bodyValueValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation has no bodyValue key or has a bodyValue key with valid value (Section 3.2.5)

bodyValueFound.title: Implementation: bodyValue
bodyValueFound.description: True when the Annotation has a valid bodyValue (Section 3.2.5)
